subject: Skiing
World Cup (Skiing)
Alpine Skiing
Olympic Games (2010)
lead_paragraph: Julia Mancuso is trying to unseat the three-time-defending overall champion Lindsey Vonn on the World Cup trail, while playing down the notion of a rift.
snippet: Julia Mancuso is trying to unseat the three-time-defending overall champion Lindsey Vonn on the World Cup trail, while playing down the notion of a rift.
